overview:
Virendra Vase is the VP of Engineering at Jigsaw, where he is responsible for all engineering and network operations.

Virendra joined Jigsaw from Yahoo, where he was Vice President of Engineering in the Search & Advertising Technology group responsible for Small Medium Business, CRM, APT adoption, Business Intelligence Platform for the Performance Advertising Network, among other initiatives. Prior to that, Virendra was COO at MetaReward/Experian, a performance based Ad Network, which grew from 10M to 80M annually during his tenure there. Virendra was responsible for all aspects of day-to-day operations (Engineering, Operations, Customer Service, Web Development, Finance & HR). Virendra has held executive positions at Responsys and at AdKnowledge (an Engage Company). Virendra received his MS in Computer Engineering from Clemson University and BS in Electrical Engineering from Pune University, India.
